parameters.jsonBody:
{
  "modelId": "6bef9f1b-29cb-40c7-b9df-32b51c1f67d3",
  "prompt": "{{ $json.visual_prompts[0] }}, crystal glass material, volumetric lighting, 8K ultra detailed, photorealistic, luxury car transformation, holographic effects, alien technology, galaxy conquest theme",
  "negative_prompt": "blurry, low quality, distorted, ugly, deformed",
  "num_images": 4,
  "width": 1024,
  "height": 1024,
  "guidance_scale": 8.5,
  "num_inference_steps": 100,
  "seed": {{ Math.floor(Math.random() * 1000000) }},
  "presetStyle": "LEONARDO",
  "scheduler": "LEONARDO",
  "public": false,
  "promptMagic": true,
  "promptMagicVersion": "v3",
  "promptMagicStrength": 0.5,
  "photoReal": true,
  "photoRealVersion": "v2",
  "alchemy": true,
  "contrastRatio": 0.9,
  "expandedDomain": true,
  "fantasyAvatar": false,
  "highContrast": true,
  "highResolution": true,
  "imagePromptWeight": 0.3,
  "init_generation_image_id": null,
  "init_image_id": null,
  "init_strength": 0.3,
  "modelId": "6bef9f1b-29cb-40c7-b9df-32b51c1f67d3",
  "nsfw": false,
  "sd_version": "v2",
  "tiling": false,
  "ultra": true,
  "unzoom": false,
  "upscaleRatio": 2,
  "weighting": 0.75
}

{
  "prompt": "Volumetric glass rendering of {{ $json.visual_prompts[1] }}, crystal clear transparency, caustics lighting, refraction effects, holographic depth layers, quantum particle effects, alien technology integration, 8K photorealistic, cinema4d style, octane render",
  "width": 1024,
  "height": 1024,
  "prompt_upsampling": true,
  "seed": {{ Math.floor(Math.random() * 1000000) }},
  "safety_tolerance": 2,
  "output_format": "png",
  "guidance": 3.5,
  "steps": 28,
  "interval": 2,
  "aspect_ratio": "1:1"
}

parameters.name: caption
